# ZakatEasy

> Free Islamic Zakat Calculator — Calculate Zakat on gold, silver, cash and investments using live prices.

ZakatEasy is a free online Zakat calculator that helps Muslims accurately calculate their annual Zakat obligation. It supports multiple currencies, gold and silver Nisab standards, and provides real-time metal prices via a secure API.

## Features

- Zakat Calculator: calculates 2.5% of net zakatable wealth above the Nisab threshold
- Gold Standard Nisab: based on 87.48 grams of gold (7.5 tola)
- Silver Standard Nisab: based on 612.36 grams of silver (52.5 tola)
- Multi-currency support: auto-detects user location and converts to local currency (USD, GBP, INR, AED, PKR, etc.)
- Live gold and silver prices updated daily
- Covers: cash, gold, silver, investments, business assets, and deductible liabilities
- No signup required — all calculations happen in the browser

## Key Facts

- Zakat rate: 2.5% (1/40th) of net zakatable wealth
- Nisab (gold): 87.48 grams of gold
- Nisab (silver): 612.36 grams of silver
- Hawl: one full lunar year of holding wealth above Nisab
- Zakat applies to: cash, gold, silver, stocks, business inventory
- Zakat does NOT apply to: primary home, personal vehicle, clothing, furniture
